content.text:
# Show Up Queen

"Show Up Queen" is the seventh episode of the sixth season of the American television series ''RuPaul's Drag Race All Stars''. It originally aired on July 29, 2021. Zaldy is a guest judge. Alexis Mateo makes a guest appearance.
Episode
makes a guest appearance.]]
For the main challenge, the contestants write their own verse to "Show Up Queen" in teams. Team 1 includes Eureka!, Ginger Minj, and Kylie Sonique Love. Team 2 includes Jan, Pandora Boxx, Ra'Jah O'Hara, and Trinity K. Bonet.
Zaldy is a guest judge. The runway category is "Hot Tropics". Eureka!, Ginger Minj, Kylie Sonique Love, Ra'Jah O'Hara, and Trinity K. Bonet receive positive critiques, and Trinity is named the Top All Star of the week. Jan and Pandora Boxx receive negative critiques and both are the bottom two contestants of the week.
It is revealed that Alexis Mateo is this week's Lip Sync Assassin. Trinity K. Bonet and Alexis Mateo face off in a lip-sync contest to "Dance Again" (2012) by Jennifer Lopez featuring Pitbull. Alexis Mateo wins the lip-sync. She reveals that the group vote is tied between Jan and Pandora Boxx. RuPaul then explains that since the group vote was tied, the deciding vote would be the Top All Star's one. Trinity K. Bonet then reveals she wanted to eliminate Jan from the competition.
Production
The episode originally aired on July 29, 2021.
